attributes.action: Close the Black Police Officers Association
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the Black Police Officers Association closed as this is discriminatory against non black officers from all other communities and replaced with one body to represent all minority groups in the force. This body should also be accessable to white officers with race and discrimination issues.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
